hints.content:
Multiplication and division are related:

$\begin{align}
\greenD{\text{number of groups}} \times \maroonD{\text{size of groups}} = \purpleC{\text{total}} \\\\
\maroonD{\text{size of groups}} \times \greenD{\text{number of groups}} = \purpleC{\text{total}} \\\\
\\\\
\purpleC{\text{total}} \div \greenD{\text{number of groups}} =\maroonD{\text{size of groups}} \\\\
\purpleC{\text{total}} \div \maroonD{\text{size of groups}} =\greenD{\text{number of groups}}
\end{align}$

In this fact family, the $\greenD{\text{number of the groups}}$ is $\greenD{9}$.

The $\maroonD{\text{size of the groups}}$ is ${\maroonD{8}}$.

![Tape diagram showing question mark is equal to 9 equal groups of 8](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9633294bf38711b44854aa315c1fe1e7e508d072)

The $\purpleC{\text{total}}$ is $\purpleC{?}$.
The equation $\purpleC{{?}} = \greenD{9} \times {\maroonD{8}}$ can help us find the unknown number.

question.content:
**Create an equation to help us find the unknown number in ${?} \div 9 = 8$ .**

[[☃ dropdown 6]] $= 9\times{}$[[☃ dropdown 4]]
